hook.text: The buyer says 'we're fine' while the team burns out and revenue drops. Surface answers hide real pain.

buildup.text: Pain discovery digs beneath surface complaints to find root problems driving real buyer behavior.

discovery.text: Ask 'why' five times. Each layer uncovers deeper pain. The real trigger hides several layers down.

twist.text: Some buyers don't know their own pain. Great sellers help them see problems they haven't recognized.

climax.text: Use open-ended probing questions. Let silence work. The most valuable insights come after the pause.

punchline.text: Dig past the surface. Real pain hides deeper.

quiz.question: What technique helps uncover deeper pain points?
options: Asking 'why' multiple times to peel back layers
